snippet: An agreement was reached Tuesday to overhaul a troubled prison in the same Louisiana parish as New Orleans, but financing for the agreement has remained unresolved.
abstract: State, local and federal officials reach agreement to overhaul troubled Orleans Parish Prison in New Orleans, long criticized as a place of violence, sexual assault and abuse, but financing remains unresolved.
lead_paragraph: An agreement was reached Tuesday to overhaul a troubled prison in the same Louisiana parish as New Orleans, but financing for the agreement has remained unresolved.

headline.seo: New Orleans Jail Pact Addresses Issue of Violence
headline.main: Officials Announce Pact on Jail in Louisiana
headline.print_headline: Officials Announce Pact on Jail In Louisiana
